release.action: The Web Service dialog displays different items in support for multiple input and output operations. Individual input and output structures are not shown, only the number of them appears. The endpoint package and target namespace for the Service endpoint are now modifiable.
The Operations dialog now displays a table of input and a table of output structures. Each table has a set of Add/Edit/Remove buttons. An operation can also specify a CICS Channel.
The Structure dialog maps JAXB objects to inputs and outputs. It also allows a JAXB object to map a CICS Container.

The service descriptor format has changed. It used to be a simple properties file, it is now an XML with the same Schema as the inner object expected by the cixsgen ANT task and also the CIXS Generator XML descriptor used as input to the XSLT code generation process. In other words, there is now a single XML Schema to represent XSLT input to code generation, ANT task inner object and Eclipse plugin model.
build-service.template is now used to generate the ANT task. This has replaced the build-service.xml file that used to serve as a template.
